content:
We're encouraging everyone visit DC on Wednesday. We don't have an official conference dinner, but here are a few recommendations of some nice restaurants in the city.

  • Dolan Uyghur Restaurant
  • Indique
  • Medium Rare
  • Lebanese Taverna
  • Jaleo
  • Zaytinya
  • Oyamel Cocina Mexicana
There are so many restaurants in DC, it's impossible to give a good representation.

Tomorrow I'll start organizing at least one large-ish group to go to one of the above. Find me if you're interested. I'll also announce something in the opening remarks. Feel free to message me here too.
